outputs.output_descr: The DG Sector Strategy proposes a sector management, coordination and communication mechanism that will oversee the implementation of sector activities, ensure policy coherence and realisation of results. UNDP will support the establishment and operationalisation of the coordination mechanism; will ensure that there is a communication strategy being implemented, joint planning, budgeting, implementation, as well as effective monitoring and evaluation

project_descr: Democratic Governance Sector Programme is to support GoM to implement the DG Sector Strategy 2013. It will focus on strengthening coordination and capacity of sector institutions towards achievement of the strategy Key Result Areas.
